text: Ekaterina Olegovna Efremenkova (, born 31 December 1997) is a Russian short track speed skater.Ефременкова Екатерина Олеговна. ruskating.com She won a bronze medal in the 3,000 meters relay at the 2016 World Short Track Speed Skating Championships.EFREMENKOVA, Ekaterina. shorttrackonline.info ==World Cup podiums== {|class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" style="text- align:center" |- !Date !Season !Location !Rank !Event |- | 14 February 2016 || align=center|2015–16|| Dordrecht || || 1500 m |- | 12 February 2017 || align=center|2016–17|| Minsk || || 1500 m |- | 1 October 2017 || align=center|2017–18|| Budapest || || 3000 m relay |- | 19 November 2017 || align=center|2017–18|| Seoul || || 3000 m relay |- | 3 November 2018 || align=center|2018–19|| Calgary || || 1500 m |- | 4 November 2018 || align=center|2018–19|| Calgary || || 3000 m relay |- | 11 November 2018 || align=center|2018–19|| Salt Lake City || || 3000 m relay |- | 8 December 2018 || align=center|2018–19|| Almaty || || 1500 m |- | 3 February 2019 || align=center|2018–19|| Dresden || || 3000 m relay |- | 10 February 2019 || align=center|2018–19|| Torino || || 2000 m mixed relay |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Russian female short track speed skaters Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic short track speed skaters of Russia Category:Universiade gold medalists for Russia Category:Universiade silver medalists for Russia Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Russia Category:Universiade medalists in short track speed skating Category:Competitors at the 2019 Winter Universiade
title: Ekaterina Efremenkova
